Articles.Content:
I've been here so long, given all i could to this community, and now i will leave for an indeterminate amount of time. There is an 95% chance i will come back eventually, with new material, but until then, i bid you farewell and run off the celebrate the release of 1.0.3.

[*Souper's HP drops to 0 and makes him instantly go from pristine condition to a fiery mess of debris and ashes*](http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/CriticalExistenceFailure)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T23:21:32Z" title="06/22/2015 11:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by Souper**

Well, see you eventually. I hope you come back as awesomely as Starwhip and HOC Gaming! (HOC is doing KSP again. Look at his channel; he's already got 3 episodes up.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T01:36:10Z" title="06/23/2015 01:36  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

See ya around!

Meh Name is Starwhip. With a "W".

It was autocorrect, dangit!

(Another fail; it wanted to change the last word to danger.)

![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> It was autocorrect, dangit!
> (Another fail; it wanted to change the last word to danger.)
> 
> ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Ah well that explains it. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
